alert.note: Alert for Jefferson Davis; Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 8:16AM CST until January 12 at 8:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CST FOR SOUTHERN LAWRENCE AND SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS COUNTIES... At 816 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Topeka, or 18 miles northwest of Kokomo, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Robinwood around 825 AM CST. Arm and Tilton around 830 AM CST. Oak Vale and Progress around 835 AM CST. Society Hill around 840 AM CST. Prentiss around 845 AM CST. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for south central Mississippi. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
